item.title: Caveats to Creating Datadog Log Metrics in Terraform
item.description: In this post, I give an overview of how to create Datadog Log Metrics in Terraform. Having had done this recently, I encountered a couple of caveats that warranted documenting. Hopefully it will help others that encountered similar issues. This post assumes that you have a basic configuration for Datadog in Terraform already. If you don’t, Datadog’s post on managing Datadog with Terraform is a good starting point.
